★ 30+ Years of Manufacturing Excellence

Scalable OEM/ODM Manufacturing: From Fiber to Finished Fashion.

Empower your brand with our vertical supply chain, trend-driven R&D, and zero-defect control protocols. Monthly capacity: 200,000+ Pcs.

Start Your Project

settings.sub_title1: Our technical team is ready to discuss your design, recommend materials, and optimize for production efficiency.
settings.sub_title2: We provide A4 swatches and sample yardage. Bring your vision to life before committing to bulk production.
settings.sub_title3: Your custom designs are your intellectual property. We guarantee strict Confidentiality and exclusivity.
settings.sub_title4: From boutique orders to large-scale manufacturing, our facility is equipped to handle your volume needs.

Material Sourcing & Innovation

Start Sourcing Request →
Trusted by Industry Leaders Worldwide

The Competitive Edge

Why global brands trust us with their complex supply chain and manufacturing needs.

01. Supply Chain Power

Source-Level Material Control

We eliminate production risks at the yarn level.

  • Abundant Raw Material Reserves: Stock over 500 types of special yarns reducing procurement cycle by 30%.
  • Custom Trims: 100% customized development from buttons to zippers.
  • Lab-Tested Quality: ISO standard color fastness and shrinkage tests.
02. Development Capability

Trend-to-Sample Engineering

We don't just follow trends; we make them producible.

  • In-House Craft Workshops: Printing, embroidery, and washing workshops ensure 99% design reproduction.
  • Tech Pack Optimization: Reducing production costs by 15% while maintaining aesthetics.
  • Rapid Prototyping: 7-day rapid prototyping turnaround.
03. Manufacturing Strength

Precision & Scalability

Zero-defect protocol from cutting to packing.

  • Automated Cutting: Bullmer/Lectra machines with precision within 1mm.
  • Scalable Capacity: Over 10 lines with 100,000+ pieces monthly capacity.
  • Process Control: Implement in-line quality control (Inline QC).

Flexible Cooperation Models

Whether you bring a concept or a finished tech pack, we have the industrial backbone to execute it.

ODM Service

Model A: ODM (Design-Led)

You provide a concept or mood board. We deliver a market-ready collection.

Backed by Advanced Crafts:

  • Trend Insight: Global fashion trend database access.
  • Auxiliary Crafts: In-house washing, digital printing, and embroidery.
  • Custom Trims: Bespoke buttons, zippers, and label development.
Start Development →
OEM Service

Model B: OEM (Spec-Led)

You provide the Tech Pack. We can accurately execute your requirements and possess the capability for mass production.

Industrial Strength:

  • Supply Chain: Direct control over raw yarns and fabrics.
  • QC Protocol: Process-controlled quality (preventing errors before they happen).
  • Capacity: High-volume automated production lines.
Get a Quick Quote →

Customization PROCESS
01

Inquiry

Proposal within 24h.

02

Sampling

7-day rapid prototype.

03

Production

Flexible MOQ & tracking.

04

Inspection

Raw material to final QC.

05

Delivery

Global shipping 120+.

Common Queries

Manufacturing & Customization FAQs

We rely on Industrial Scheduling, not luck. With 30 years of legacy, we operate automated production lines with massive throughput. Our ERP-driven scheduling ensures your order slot is locked and resources are allocated in advance.

Our philosophy is "Prevention over Detection." We implement a 6-Stage QC Protocol: Raw Material Check -> Pre-production -> Cutting -> Inline -> Final QC -> Needle Detection.

Absolutely. Our ODM team acts as your Technical Consultant. We analyze your concept against current global trends and propose feasible fabrics from our in-house library.

Through Vertical Integration. Unlike factories that outsource purchasing, we control the yarn and fabric source directly. This "Source Control" eliminates color variance.

We understand that different projects require different scales. As an OEM/ODM specialist, we offer flexible tiers based on product complexity:

Product Category Trial / Boutique Order Standard Production
Embroidery Fabrics 100 Meters
(Surcharge applies) 		300+ Meters / Color
Fashion Gowns 50 Pieces / Style 200+ Pieces / Style
Fleece / Faux Garment 300 Pieces / Style 1,000+ Pieces / Style
Crochet Garment 500 Pieces / Style 1,000+ Pieces / Style

*Note: For fully custom development (ODM) or specific fabric requirements, please contact our specialists.

We offer 7-Day Rapid Prototyping for standard materials. Sampling fees apply initially to cover specialized labor but are 100% Refundable when the bulk order meets our MOQ quantity.

Quality Assurance System

FULL PRODUCTION CONTROL

Comprehensive quality control across the entire production lifecycle.

PRE-PRODUCTION Risk Prevention (Steps 01-04)
IN-PRODUCTION Process Control (Steps 05-06)
POST-PRODUCTION Final Audit (Steps 07-08)
Raw Material Production Inspection
Incoming QC (IQC)
PP Sample Verification
Pre-Production Meeting
Cut piece inspection
In-Process QC (IPQC)
Final QC (FQC)
Packing & Safety (PSI)
Swipe to view steps →
01

Raw Material Control

We eliminate risks at the source. Strict assessment of yarn suppliers and consistency checks before materials ever enter our warehouse.

  • Vendor Qualification Audit
  • Yarn Strength Testing
02

Incoming Lab Testing (IQC)

Every roll of fabric undergoes 4-point American standard inspection. Samples are sent to our internal lab immediately.

  • Color Fastness & Shrinkage Test
  • Gram Weight (GSM) Verification
03

Gold Seal Sample Verification

The Pre-Production (PP) sample is the "Bible" of mass production. No cutting begins until the client signs off on the Gold Seal sample.

  • Fit & Measurement Check
  • Accessories Matching
04

Pre-Production Risk Analysis

Technicians, line managers, and QC leads gather to analyze the craft file and predict potential defects before lines start running.

  • Critical Craftsmanship Review
  • Sewing SOP Definition
05

Automated Precision Cutting

Utilizing digital auto-cutters (Bullmer/Lectra) to ensure millimeter-level accuracy. Cut panels are inspected 100%.

  • Pattern Alignment Check
  • Bundling & Numbering
06

Inline Roaming QC (IPQC)

Quality is manufactured, not inspected. Roaming QCs patrol lines every hour to catch semi-finished issues instantly.

  • First Piece Inspection
  • Roaming Line Audit
07

Final Quality Audit (FQC)

Finished garments undergo a rigorous check covering measurements, appearance.

  • 100% Measurement Check
  • Thread Trimming Audit
08

Safety Scan & Packaging

The final gatekeeper. Needle detection scanning and packaging audits ensure your goods are safe and logistics-ready.

  • Metal Detection
  • Eco-friendly Material Packaging

Embroidery & Garment OEM/ODM Solutions

Start Development

Vertical Integration

Seamless control from yarn sourcing to garment finishing.

Scalable Craft

Reproducible mass production standards without compromising aesthetics.

Collection Dev

Holistic seasonal planning and series development for your brand.

Agile Mfg

Flexible lines support small-batch reorders (S/M/L) with rigorous QC.
